txt.en: Aid the community of Thorin's Hall to inspire, hearten, and strengthen those assisting the cooks as they craft hard tack for an expedition. You will need to execute special recipes and deliver your creations for everyone involved.

Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space

Aid the community of Thorin's Hall to inspire, hearten, and strengthen those assisting the cooks as they craft hard tack for an expedition. You will need to execute special recipes and deliver your creations for everyone involved.

Aid the community of Thorin's Hall to inspire, hearten, and strengthen those assisting the cooks as they craft hard tack for an expedition. You will need to execute special recipes and deliver your creations for everyone involved.
Your assistance in feeding and slaking the thirst of those assisting the cooks to craft hard tack is complete. You exceeded expectations and should visit the coordinator to receive your final reward.
You earned Tier I Cook Rewards ([placeholder]/5)

Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
\qMagnificent cooking, friend. You deserve many thanks for assisting us in crafting the hard tack in the ovens above. Please, take this reward for your efforts.\q
Cooking large amounts of hard tack takes a full community effort. As a cook, you are well-suited to assist the dwarves.

'We do not need cooks to make the hard tack for the expedition. The best cooks in Thorin's Hall are engaged in the effort to make the hard tack. You can, however, assist everyone in their duties by making food that inspires, heartens, and strengthens all those assisting in the effort.

'We offer greater rewards for greater assistance.'

<rgb=#00FF00>Accepting this quest will lock you out of accepting the Assist or Prospector Quests in the Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall Event.</rgb>\q
Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space
Hard Tack Event: Cooking
Earn Thorin's Hall Commendations - Tier I ([placeholder]/5)
